name: Shooty Shooty Space McGrooty
description:
Shooty Shooty Space McGrooty is a short vertical space shooter recreation of the climax of everyone's favorite space opera--STer Wurz.

You play as Duke Fartknocker aiding the Rebel Alliance to destroy the Galactic Empire's ultimate weapon, the Death Star! A weapon that can blow up your favorite restaurant or somethin'.

Controls:

Q - to attack

Arrow keys - to move

Space - to use bomb

Features:

  • It's short!
  • It's free!
  • It's like poetry, it sort of they rhyme

As a small side note, for whatever reason when launching the game for the first time, some systems don't load the audio. I've only found one way to fix this, so if this does happen to you, restarting the game should get the audio to work properly.

If you have any questions or comments you'd like to ask/tell me, please e-mail me at "todd_grimblestein@outlook.com"

Thanks, and have fun!

disney please don't sue me
